title: Ultimate Spinach - Behold And See [MP3 320Kbps CBR]
description:
This is the original vinyl record. When Alan Lorber re-mixed the master tapes for
the CD re-issue some years back he changed the sound substantially and also
chopped more than 10 minutes from the original playing time. Sadly, my copy
is by no means perfect and there is a horrible scratch on Genesis Of Beauty which
I have tried to erradicate as far as possible, but which cannot be totally removed
without destroying the track in the process. There are also some other less prominent scratches and crackle which have been difficult to remove elsewhere on the record, but this is inevitable with a record that is 40 years old.

Sampled from the original vinyl at 44KHz, 16-bit stereo. 
Scratch removal using Brian Davies&#039; ClickRepair v2.21. 
Noise removal and normalisation with Audacity 1.3.4.
Encoded at 320kbps CBR using LAME.
MP3 tags by TagScanner 5.0.

Enjoy :)


Ultimate Spinach - Behold And See

Side 1:

Gilded Lamp Of The Cosmos
Visions Of Your Reality
Jazz Thing
Mind Flowers


Side 2:

Where You&#039;re At
Suite: Genesis Of Beauty (in four parts)
Fifth Horseman Of The Apocalypse
Fragmentary March Of Green


Produced by Alan Lorber, engineer Val Valentin, Harry Yarmark

(P) 1968 MGM SE-4570

All tracks written and arranged by Ian Bruce-Douglas

Ian Bruce-Douglas - Vocals, keyboards?
Barbara Hudson - Vocals, kazoo, guitar
Keith Lahteinen - Vocals, drums, percusion
Richard Nese - Bass
Geoffrey Winthrop - vocals, guitar, sitar

De-clicked at 30 with pitch-protection 
except "Genesis" manual fix for scratch
between 5.58 and 6.25 then de-clicked at 30.
